meanings.sent1: The inefficaciousness of the old medicine led to the search for a better cure.
meanings.sent2: The inefficaciousness of the plan was evident when it failed to achieve the desired outcome.
meanings.sent3: The magician's spell to make the rabbit disappear was met with inefficaciousness, as the bunny stayed put.
meanings.sent4: The inefficaciousness of the broken compass left the explorers lost in the dense forest.
meanings.sent5: The inefficaciousness of the leaky roof became apparent during the heavy rainstorm.

meanings.definition: Inability to produce the desired result.
meanings.sent1: The inefficaciousness of the machine caused delays in production.
meanings.sent2: Despite their efforts, the inefficaciousness of the team's strategy led to defeat.
meanings.sent3: The inefficaciousness of the chef's attempt at baking a cake resulted in a burnt mess.
meanings.sent4: The inefficaciousness of the faulty remote control made it impossible to change the channel.
meanings.sent5: The inefficaciousness of the flashlight's dim light left the hikers stumbling in the dark.
